Trophy.Title: Deadly Premonition: The Director's Cut Platinum Trophy
Trophy.Description: Zach, it's over, all finished. It's time for you to leave town. Are you ready to go?

Trophy.Title: Prologue CLEARED
Trophy.Description: FBI Special Agent Francis York Morgan. Please, just call me York.

Trophy.Title: Episode 1 CLEARED
Trophy.Description: George, the perpetrator is just like you. He's passionate about women. He's a passionate kisser. This was a "kiss of death."

Trophy.Title: Episode 2 (part 1) CLEARED
Trophy.Description: So Becky is Miss Stiletto Heel. And she gave the locket to the twins... Must be the "special secret" Lilly told us about, Zach.

Trophy.Title: Episode 2 (part 2) CLEARED
Trophy.Description: Zach, Diane has become the third victim of our killer. And nada from questioning Nick... Nothing. Got no new leads from questioning Nick.

Trophy.Title: Episode 3 CLEARED
Trophy.Description: Zach, OK. So it's not bonus footage, it's still part of the main feature. The perpetrator is exactly who I thought it was.

Trophy.Title: Episode 4 CLEARED
Trophy.Description: Ah, right, he doesn't have a "tattoo" on his back. But there is a "pattern" there.

Trophy.Title: Episode 5 CLEARED
Trophy.Description: Zach, I need you to pray with me. Pray that things have not gone too far. All we can do is go to the location written in Kaysen's letter.

Trophy.Title: Episode 6 CLEARED
Trophy.Description: My name is York. Me and you, we'll always be together. OK, Zach? I'm you, and you are me. Now, give me your hand.

Trophy.Title: Episode 7 CLEARED
Trophy.Description: Then this is goodbye, Zach. Thank you for everything.

Trophy.Title: Delivery Man Q
Trophy.Description: Follow up on Becky's friends and find "Delivery Man Q" from Anna's diary. Sneak into the house of someone whose name starts with a Q, find evidence and take it to Becky.

Trophy.Title: Guardian of the Art Gallery
Trophy.Description: Diane is hiding something. Find the painting of [The Girl in the Woods] slumbering somewhere in the art gallery and give it to her. She may open up to you.

Trophy.Title: Memories of Anna
Trophy.Description: Someone is taking walks in Anna's forest in the early afternoon when the weather is clear. Find this person and hand over the [Out of Focus Picture] from the twins. It could be a new lead!

Trophy.Title: Lost Arnold
Trophy.Description: George has lost his beloved [Arnold] somewhere in the Sheriff's Office. He can't train without him! Find what he's looking for and get it back to him. Help him get his groove back.

Trophy.Title: Nameless Flower
Trophy.Description: George's mother is sick and so he wants to get her favorite flower for her. Find the [Flower with No Name] that only blooms in the rain and take it to George when he's at home after 21:00.

Trophy.Title: Nice Try Cooking
Trophy.Description: Emily only ever cooks at home on evenings when it is raining. Find the "Fermented Dairy Products" that she needs for her next dish and help her out.

Trophy.Title: Another Nice Try Cooking
Trophy.Description: Emily only ever cooks at home on evenings when it is raining. Find the "Vegetables that become sweet when heated" that she needs for her next dish and help her out.

Trophy.Title: Memorable Cooking
Trophy.Description: Find the "Something chewy and salty" "something soft with two colors" "Yellow Sauce" that Emily needs for her next dish and help her out.

Trophy.Title: Unwanted Customer
Trophy.Description: A customer at the Galaxy of Terror has practically been stalking Carol, causing trouble for her. Drive off this "Unwanted Customer" who comes to the bar after 21:00.

Trophy.Title: Periodic Riddle
Trophy.Description: Ushah has been given a "riddle" from Fiona that uses elemental symbols, but has no idea what the answer is. This doesn't seem related to the case... but why not help him find the answer?

Trophy.Title: Snack for Willie
Trophy.Description: Willie has nabbed a [Bone] uncovered in the course the investigation. It could be important evidence. Get the [Bone] back from Willie's kennel in the back of Kaysen's car.

Trophy.Title: Someone in the Forest
Trophy.Description: Someone is walking in Anna's forest in the early afternoon, when the weather is clear. Give this person the [Out of Focus Picture]. Let the twins know once you have found out who the "ghost" is.

Trophy.Title: Legendary Tabatha
Trophy.Description: You'll never catch [Tabatha] with your current fishing rod. Borrow the legendary fishing rod from Jim and try again. [Tabatha] appears near the waterfall only on rainy days.

Trophy.Title: Map to Psychic Spot A
Trophy.Description: "Cope's Tunnel" is marked on a suspicious map purchased from Keith at the Milk Barn. Go to the marked location and clear the "Other World" challenge there.

Trophy.Title: Map to Psychic Spot B
Trophy.Description: "The scene of a railway accident" is marked on a suspicious map purchased from Keith at the Milk Barn. Go to the marked location and clear the "Other World" challenge there.

Trophy.Title: Map to Psychic Spot C
Trophy.Description: "The GV Electrical Substation" is marked on a suspicious map purchased from Keith at the Milk Barn. Go to the marked location and clear the "Other World" challenge there.

Trophy.Title: The Bond Between Men
Trophy.Description: Quietly return the [Legendary Guitar Grecotch] to Keith when he is working at the Milk Barn. This could be the start of a lasting friendship.

Trophy.Title: Part Time Job 1
Trophy.Description: Lilly has given you part-time work tidying up the Milk Barn's storeroom by pushing the boxes around. The Milk Barn is only open when the weather is nice. Lunch break included!

Trophy.Title: Part Time Job 2
Trophy.Description: Lilly has given you more part-time work tidying up the Milk Barn's storeroom by pushing the boxes around. Didn't you take care of this just a short while ago? What are they doing in there?

Trophy.Title: Part Time Job 3
Trophy.Description: Lilly has given you further part-time work tidying up the Milk Barn's storeroom by pushing the boxes around. Honestly, they can't even be trying to keep it tidy in there!

Trophy.Title: The Legendary Guitar
Trophy.Description: Use the [Key for Closet] obtained from Lilly for your hard work to open the closet in Keith's garage. He should be home in the afternoons on rainy days.

Trophy.Title: Greenvale Trivia
Trophy.Description: Talk to Harry while he is at home and he'll give you a quiz on Greenvale. Get three correct answers in a row to clear it. Why not give it a try?

Trophy.Title: Incomplete Treasure
Trophy.Description: Michael says he had lost a "most precious object" while he was at the diner. Find it and give it back to him. He is at home between 21:00 and 22:30. Talk to him when Harry isn't there.

Trophy.Title: Nick's Letter
Trophy.Description: Nick, in prison, has asked you to take a letter to Olivia for him. She's holed herself up at home, so take the [Letter from Nick] to her.

Trophy.Title: Big Bag
Trophy.Description: Something important is hidden in the Diner's kitchen. Use the [Key to Back Door of Diner] received from Nick to get inside after hours and continue the investigation.

Trophy.Title: A Return to Better Things
Trophy.Description: Having obtained the [Letter from Olivia] containing her heartfelt feelings, take it to Nick in his holding cell and put his mind at ease.

Trophy.Title: Where's the Dress!
Trophy.Description: Anna's mother Sallie is searching for [Anna's Dress]. Find the dress somewhere in Anna's house and give it to Sallie.

Trophy.Title: Anna's Diary
Trophy.Description: Use [Anna's Key] obtained from her dress to search her room. There must be something out of place in there. Anna's room is on the second floor.

Trophy.Title: Engagement Ring
Trophy.Description: Delivery Man Q is probably Quint. He may well have some important evidence concerning the case. Give Becky's [Engagement Ring] to him and he may tell you the truth.

Trophy.Title: Top Rank
Trophy.Description: Use the [Dart Gun] to play the darts game and defeat Richard's long standing top score.

Trophy.Title: The Beauty
Trophy.Description: Polly has a precious piece of "memorabilia" somewhere in the hotel. Find it and give it to her. Not to be rude, but memory deteriorates with age. You might want to check her room...

Trophy.Title: Medical Studies
Trophy.Description: Fiona, in the hospital, has given you a quiz on medical matters. Get three correct answers in a row to clear it. Why not give it a try?

Trophy.Title: Special Service
Trophy.Description: Gina, at Heaven & Hell Gas, will perform a special service if you use the carwash a certain number of times. Why not check it out? I wouldn't get your hopes up, though...

Trophy.Title: Benjamin Franklin
Trophy.Description: Jack, at Heaven & Hell Gas, wants $100 bills. Hey, don't we all? However, if you give him more than $1000 he'll supposedly give you some really big info. For the investigation, then...!

Trophy.Title: Beginner Collector
Trophy.Description: Wesley, the owner of the shop Panda Bear, is an avid trading card collector. Show him your own collection. 8 cards will get you a "small thank you." His shop hours are from 20:00 to 06:00.

Trophy.Title: Amateur Collector
Trophy.Description: Wesley, the owner of the shop Panda Bear, is an avid trading card collector. Show him your own collection. 16 cards will get you a "moderate thank you." His shop hours are from 20:00 to 06:00.

Trophy.Title: Normal Collector
Trophy.Description: Wesley, the owner of the shop Panda Bear, is an avid trading card collector. Show him your own collection. 32 cards will get you a "big thank you." His shop hours are from 20:00 to 06:00.

Trophy.Title: Great Collector
Trophy.Description: Wesley, the owner of the shop Panda Bear, is an avid trading card collector. Show him your own collection. 48 cards will get you a "rare thank you." His shop hours are from 20:00 to 06:00.

Trophy.Title: Top Collector
Trophy.Description: Wesley, the owner of the shop Panda Bear, is an avid trading card collector. Show him your own collection. 64 cards will get you a "super rare thank you." His shop hours are from 20:00 to 06:00.

Trophy.Title: Low Gear Parts
Trophy.Description: Find the [Low Gear Parts] in the Junk Yard. The General will use it to increase the performance of your car.

Trophy.Title: High Gear Parts
Trophy.Description: Find the [High Gear Parts] in the Junk Yard. The General will use it to increase the performance of your car.

Trophy.Title: Gas Tank Parts
Trophy.Description: Find the [Gas Tank Parts] in the Junk Yard. The General will use it to increase the performance of your car.

Trophy.Title: York's Car
Trophy.Description: According to Jack your beloved car, wrecked on the mountain road, has been taken to the General's scrap yard. Request its repair and then buy it back.

Trophy.Title: Cold Pot 1
Trophy.Description: Sigourney often wanders the town when the weather is nice. Having been told that her "pot is getting cold!" you now have to take her home. Driving safely may not cut it this time.

Trophy.Title: Cold Pot 2
Trophy.Description: Sigourney often wanders the town when the weather is nice. Having been told that her "pot is getting cold!" you now have to take her home. What is she doing with that pot outside anyway?

Trophy.Title: Cold Pot 3
Trophy.Description: Sigourney often wanders the town when the weather is nice. Having been told that her "pot is getting cold!" you now have to take her home. Why is the pot getting cold such a problem?

Trophy.Title: Cold Pot 4
Trophy.Description: Sigourney often wanders the town when the weather is nice. Having been told that her "pot is getting cold!" you now have to take her home. She's just doing this on purpose, isn't she...

Trophy.Title: Cold Pot 5
Trophy.Description: Sigourney often wanders the town when the weather is nice. Having been told that her "pot is getting cold!" you now have to take her home. What's the truth behind this pot?!

Trophy.Title: Seven Bones
Trophy.Description: Wild dogs have been through the grave- yard and now 7 [Bones] are missing. Brian has pretty much demanded that you get them back. Use his marks on the map, find the [Bones] and return them.

Trophy.Title: Ghost House Treasure
Trophy.Description: Use the [Key] received from Brian to check out his house. It is an old place in a corner of downtown. There might be something important hidden there... or maybe not.
